mapper.select: SELECT t2.user_id AS userId, t2.username AS username, t1.remark AS remark, t1.create_time AS createTime, t3.avatar AS avatar, t3.age, t3.email, t3.gender, t3.signature, t3.nickname, t3.phone FROM t_contact t1 LEFT JOIN t_user t2 ON t1.contact_id=t2.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_property t3 ON t2.user_id=t3.user_id WHERE t1.user_id=#{uid}

SELECT t1.remark, t1.create_time AS createTime, t2.user_id AS userId, t2.username, t3.avatar, t3.age, t3.email, t3.gender, t3.signature, t3.nickname, t3.phone FROM t_contact t1 LEFT JOIN t_user t2 ON t1.contact_id=t2.user_id LEFT JOIN `t_user_property` t3 ON t2.user_id=t3.user_id WHERE t1.user_id=#{userId} AND t1.contact_id=#{contactId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_contact SET remark=#{remark} WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND contact_id=#{contactId}
